main event: A bright light, like a full moon, was spotted in the northern sky near Eatonton, Georgia, moving erratically and descending on July 20, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as bright, metallic, and giving off a bright light.
The object moved in an erratic manner, changing direction frequently.
The object disappeared from view behind some trees at about 40 degrees above the horizon.
The witness is considered a reliable source.
sighted object: a bright light, like a full moon, moving erratically
